Properties

CPPlotRange * xRange
 The range of the x coordinate.
CPPlotRange * yRange
 The range of the y coordinate.
CPPlotRange * globalXRange
 The global range of the x coordinate to which the plot range is constrained. If nil, there is no constraint on x.
CPPlotRange * globalYRange
 The global range of the y coordinate to which the plot range is constrained. If nil, there is no constraint on y.
CPScaleType xScaleType
 The scale type of the x coordinate.
CPScaleType yScaleType
 The scale type of the y coordinate.

Detailed Description

A plot space using a two-dimensional cartesian coordinate system.
